div.p: † With God; Mesore 5, indiction 11; I have received through Menas the son of Sarapammon, soldier, of the diagraphe and the demosia of the tax assessment of the 10th indiction and for dapane of the 11th indiction 1/3, one third reckoned solidus. ††† sign of Claudius. Claudius agrees; I, Phoibammon most humble deacon and notary, have subscribed. Total 1/3 solidus. Translation: S. Torallas Tovar – K.A. Worp, P.Monts.Roca 4 74
